text: Charles Lester (Chuck) Nergard (February 6, 1929 - November 9, 2017) was an American politician in the state of Florida. ==Early life== Nergard was born in Chicago in 1929 and moved to Florida in 1956. He studied at Schurz Junior College, Wright Junior College, and George Williams College. ==Political career== As a Republican, he represented the 76th District which is in St. Lucie County, Florida. He served from 1967 to 1976 and from 1978 to 1990. ==Personal life== He was married to Catherine Misheck. They had two children. During his time in the House, Nergard was also a part-time real estate developer. His religion was listed as Lutheran. Nergard died in Port St. Lucie, Florida on November 9, 2017 at the age of 88.Obituary: Charles Nergard ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Real estate developers Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Florida Legislature
title: Chuck Nergard
